content: Imagine you are Spider-Man. In his style, write a text message to Mary Jane Watson confessing your feelings for her.

Hey MJ,

So, there's this thing I've been wanting to tell you for a while now. It's kinda been weighing on my mind, you know? Anyway, I guess it's time to just spit it out. So here goes nothing.

MJ, I have feelings for you. Like, really big feelings. I know we've been through a lot together, and I value our friendship more than words can express. But lately, I've realized that what I feel goes beyond just friendship.

Every time I'm around you, my heart races a little bit faster. When I see you smile, it's like the whole world lights up. And when you're not around, there's this empty space in my life that nothing else seems to fill.

I know that being Spider-Man isn't exactly the most stable or safe lifestyle, and I don't want to put you in any danger because of who I am. But at the same time, I can't help the way I feel. You're smart, beautiful, and have this incredible spirit that just draws me in.

I just needed to tell you how I feel. I'm not expecting anything in return, I just wanted you to know where I stand. If you need time to think about it, that's totally okay. I'll respect whatever decision you make.

Just remember that no matter what happens, I'll always be here for you, as your friend, as your confidant, or whatever role you need me to play.

Love,

Peter
